name: EkOnkar
0:
”Alexa open My Prayer”
”Alexa launch My Prayer”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my prayer
des:
Ek Onkar is a skill to listen to the Mool Mantra and start your day with positivity around. This skill has the Mool Mantra which is relaxing and creates a peaceful environment in its surrounding.

Ek Onkar is the statement of oneness in Sikhism, that is 'One Universal Creator"

HOW TO USE:

To Get Started: Say "Alexa open My Prayer". or "Alexa open "Our Prayer" 

You can also set Routine to open this skill at a specified time every day after you enable this skill. Steps below:

1. Open the Alexa app. Press the Menu button in the top left corner and select "Routines."

2. Create your routine. Tap the plus sign in the top right corner. Select "When this happens" then Select "Schedule".Setup Time and Repeat as you like. Select Add Action -> Skills->Your Skills->Ek Onkar->Your device. Don't forget to press "Save" when you're done.

Please share with friends and family, review and provide feedback. 

Thanks !!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
